text:
[Verse]
Clouds roll in sky turns gray
Walking alone feeling stray
Raindrops falling on this day
Wash my doubts wash them away

[Verse 2]
Streetlights sizzle in the wet
Steps I haven’t placed yet
Splashing puddles soaked regret
Heartbeats that I can't forget

[Chorus]
Lost in the rain hear it fall
Lost in the rain standing tall
Find me here in nature's call
Lost in the rain give it all

[Verse 3]
Thunder rumbles low and deep
Chasing shadows while I leap
Dreams in pockets secrets keep
In the rain no time to weep

[Verse 4]
Winds whisper sweet symphony
Solitude in harmony
With the rhythm I am free
Dancing in a stormy sea

[Chorus]
Lost in the rain hear it fall
Lost in the rain standing tall
Find me here in nature's call
Lost in the rain give it all
title: Lost in the Rain
